text: Lõunakeskus Lõunakeskus ('Southern Center') is a shopping and entertainment complex in Tartu, Estonia. It is the biggest shopping center in South Estonia. The owner of the center is Astri Group. The center was opened in 2001. The center consists of eg a year-round ice arena, Apollo Cinema, Sophia Hotel, adventure park. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2001 establishments in Estonia Category:Buildings and structures in Tartu Category:Shopping centres in Estonia Category:Shopping malls established in 2001 Category:Tourist attractions in Tartu
title: Lõunakeskus
